Class RhinoServlet

java.lang.Object

          cello.alt.servlet.RhinoServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class RhinoServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

The main Servlet class for serving up JavaScript-based web pages.

Marcello

addScriptPath

public void addScriptPath(java.lang.String path)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Adds a string-based script path to list of supported script paths. This may construct a DirectoryScriptLoader or JarScriptLoader depending on the type of the file.

Parameters:
path - the path to add
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the path

setScriptPath

public void setScriptPath(ScriptLoader sl)
Adds a ScriptLoader object to the list of script paths. New scripts are loaded by traversing the script path in order.

Parameters:
sl - the ScriptLoader to add

clearScriptPath

public void clearScriptPath()
Clears the list of script paths (this does not unload any classes).
